In case some people are wondering, Alien Shooter 2 and this (Vengeance) are the excact same games, only with different names. The content is the same as well.

Yeah, I have a problem saving in this game too. It saves my progess while I'm playing in the game. But, when I quit the game entirely and load it up again. My profile is gone as well as all of my progress.

How do I save in this game? (Not talking about being able to save at the end of each mission.) My entire saved account is gone as well as mission progress.

I get prompted asking for my "new name". :(

This game doesn't work. Help!

I think in the 2 - reloaded u cant play online >.

im running asus n10j netbook with vista.  this was not working for me at first (spitting me back out to desktop right away).  i opened error.log in alien shooter folder which said prob was it was set to run at 1024x768 which netbooks do not support (unless you managed to get compressed 1024x768 working which looks weird and which still most netbooks dont have). 
 I opened regedit and went to:
HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\SigmaTeam\Alien2\
Changed ScreenX and ScreenY to 1024x600.
works good now.  thx.
i double click on game icon. i get a black screen. game exits.the end what now?
